verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: declared] [ARG1: that the nation 's " biggest enemy is the Fake News , " particularly NBC and CNN for their coverage of the North Korea summit] .
President Trump on Wednesday declared that [ARG1: the nation 's " biggest enemy] [V: is] [ARG2: the Fake News] , " particularly NBC and CNN for their coverage of the North Korea summit .
